PPLoc: The privacy policy statement is posted in the employee meal area
activities: Development of in vitro diagnostic devices.  The performance evaluation (Investigation) phase involves clinical trials and the collection of patient data under informed consent.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: patient clinical data are collected as part of medical product development.
privacyprograms: The firm follows the U.S. HIPAA requirements for privacy and employees have all been trained on this policy.  The same privacy standards are applied to all patient data whether sourced from U.S. patients or patients outside the U.S.  We self-regulate through the internal policies and training.
recoursemech: Direct contact is the initial method.  Should there be unresolved complaints, the complainant may use EU Data Protection Authorities (DPA) and Swiss Federal data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
